requestBody.description: Represents a customer-supplied Signing Key used by Cloud CDN Signed URLs

keyName.description: Name of the key. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035. Specifically, the name must be 1-63 characters long and match the regular expression `[a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?` which means the first character must be a lowercase letter, and all following characters must be a dash, lowercase letter, or digit, except the last character, which cannot be a dash.

keyValue.description: 128-bit key value used for signing the URL. The key value must be a valid RFC 4648 Section 5 base64url encoded string.
